EmailTemplate.name: Parent Workshop - Wednesday 4th June 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Parent Workshop - Wednesday 4th June 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
Please CLICK HERE for the information inviting you to a parent workshop which will be held at the Lower School campus on Wednesday 4th June between 4:00-5:30pm. This workshop is open to all BSG parents and the wider community.
Kind regards,
Miss Kathy
Head of Lower School
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
